description: The classic story of the Three Pigs translated into the Cherokee Language. Cherokee Syllabary only. Suitable for young native readers and students of the language. ᎧᏃᎮᏗ Ꮎ ᎠᏂᏦᎢ ᏏᏆ ᎠᎴ ᎤᏲᏒ ᏩᎭᏯ. ᏂᎦᏓ ᏣᎳᎩ ᎦᏬᏂᎯᏍᏗ. ᎥᏝ ᎩᎵᏏ ᏱᎩ. ᏌᏊ ᎢᏳᏩᎦᏘ ᎤᏂᏥ ᏏᏆ ᎡᎮ . . .
subjects: Foreign Language Study, Native American Languages
title: Na Anijoi Sigwa - The Three Pigs
